name: Whale Wasters
description:
Everyone's played Pong, but not everyone's played a co-op pong...vs...a boss...not just any boss...but a SPACE WHALE!

In Whale Wasters, work with a friend (a stranger if that's your thing) to take down the evil Space Whales.
...At least I think they're evil.

Controls:
Player 1 (Left Paddle)
W - Move Upward
A - Move Downward

Player 2 (Right Paddle)
Up Arrow - Move Upward
Down Arrow - Move Downward
